alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Poinsett and Cross Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McFadden, or 13 miles northeast of Augusta, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wynne, Cherry Valley, Hickory Ridge, Vanndale, Hydrick, Birdeye, River Front, Pittinger, Supply, Wittsburg, Tilton, Colton, Brushy Lake, Mersman, Fair Field, Bay Village, Levesque, Monterey and Princedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
